description.@en: It doesn’t matter if I am hurt, bleeding or sick—the work must be done.

system.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: You may flip the results to succeed at Toughness Tests. When you succeed, it is always considered a Critical Success. Furthermore, you never reduce your Movement due to Overage.
